item.title: A Cinematographer's Take on LOEV | Film Education
item.description:
A Cinematographer's Take on LOEV | Film Education

Sherri Kauk is an exceptional Cinematographer who has been a part of the Hurlbut Visuals family for years. Sherri and I go way back to her days working with me as a Camera Assistant on many of my commercials and feature films. Like all great Camera Assistants they eventually move on to their calling and Sherri has done exactly that.
